body.name: Steamer Iron for Clothes, Hand Held Portable Travel Garment Steamer, Metal Steam Head, 25s Heat Up, Pump System, Mini Size, Handheld Steamer for Any Fabrics, No Water Spitting, 120V Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: World's #1 premium clothes steamer: Advanced heating element & metal steel head ensure great performance & reliability. Nano water filter lets you use tap water, with no risk of calcification. Handheld garment steamer always stays cool on the outside & can be put on any surface. This product is for 120V ONLY! Using any kind of adapter/converter with the steamer may cause a malfunction of your unit as well as using it with the 220V sockets!

New 360° anti-spill design: Electronic pump system & innovative steam channeling design. Steam evenly from any angle. Use it even upside down with no water spitting & leaks, while ordinary unsafe steamers cannot be tilted over 45 degrees. Enjoy safe dry ironing without burns & water spills

Powerful / ultra fast heat up / high capacity: Most powerful clothing ironing steamer on the market. Easy-to-fill water tank heats up in less than 25 seconds & powers 10 continuous minutes of effortless steaming. Unlike others, if paused, the device starts working immediately after turned back on

Portable / light weight / travel size: Look sharp on business & family trips. Mini iron steamer removes smallest wrinkles & easily fits in your backpack. Feather light & powerful as a full-sized steamer. A luxurious travel bag for easy packing. Extended ultra long cord for added convenience

8-in-1 / ideal for all fabrics / 100% satisfaction guarantee: Steam, remove wrinkles, soften, defrost & clean any type of fabric. Use it on wool, cotton, satin, linen, nylon, sequins, embroidery, beads. Bonus brush is gentle & safe to use on delicates, including silk & lace. Powerful small compact wrinkles remover for garments

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Spend a wrinkle-free vacation with Polardo mini travel steamer IT'S COMPACT. When it comes to your vacation and business trip luggage, size always matters! Polardo travel steamer takes little space in your bag. It's 3.4 x 7.7 inches ONLY, so there will always be a place for things you want to take with you. IT'S LIGHTWEIGHT. The Polardo iron steamer is only 1.2 lb, so you do not end up paying extra for excess laggage. A great fit for you if you like to travel light - it won't make much difference to the bag weight. IT'S FAST. Our product is a Ferrari in the world of steamers. It heats up in less than 25 seconds and ensures 10 minutes of continuous operation. When you put our steamer at a pause, it will resume its work immediately as you turn it back on. Not a second of your time is wasted with a Polardo steamer. IT'S POWERFUL. Regardless of the compact size, our steamer is as powerful as a full-sized iron. The stainless steel head does a perfect job removing wrinkles, so you will be ready to show your best outfit to the world in no time. Important notice! This product is for 120V ONLY! Using any kind of adapter/converter with the steamer may cause a malfunction of your unit as well as using it with the 220V sockets!

Save space in your bag Thanks to the ergonomic handle-free design, our steamer allows you to pack light or take more clothing or other essentials with you. Usually, a device with a handle occupies 25% more space. So the math is simple: no handle = +25% more room SIZE: 3.4 x 7.7 inches WEIGHT: 1.2 lb

Wrinkles don't even stand a chance with Polardo steamer - the most powerful steamer in the world An ULTRAPOWERFUL HEATING ELEMENT gets to the right temperature in less than 25 seconds and delivers consistent mist without drops for 10 minutes.

Remove tough wrinkles with just a few passes No jokes! It is possible thanks to a stainless steel head. It maintains consistent temperature and ensures flawless performance on different fabric types, even the delicate ones. Steam, iron and soften wool, cotton, satin, linen, nylon blends, sequins, embroidery, beads, and more.

UPGRADED 360-degree anti-spill technology for leak-free use Designed with cutting edge 360° no spit / anti spill technology, this little but powerful Polardo steamer can be used at any angle. Whether you want to iron your clothing in a vertical, horizontal, or even upside-down position, you can be sure that no water splitting or leaking will occur.

And now let's look into the water tank The water reservoir capacity is 4 oz (120 ml) - enough for 10 minutes of use. It's easy to refill - you just take the tank away and fill it with water. It's transparent - always know how much water is left. It's sealed - iron your clothes safely without water splashing or sprinkling.

Be ready for adventures with a Polardo steamer! The included LINT BRUSH will help you remove dirt, pet fur, and other stuff stuck to your clothes. It's a perfect compact accessory for your trip. Guess what?! You also get A TRAVEL POUCH to neatly pack your steamer and a brush for more convenient storage. It will also protect the device's surface from scratches and dirt. Make a little bit of space in your suitcase for a Polardo travel steamer to look your best anywhere and anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steamer to get package wrinkles out of velvet curtains. It worked perfectly. It's compact, easy to use, (and came with directions and a storage bag). It was strong enough to get the wrinkles out - you have to go over it slowly a time or two - but the wrinkles did come out. It is meant to be small for travel so the water reservoir was really small. In spite of that I was able to steam one 108" long by 54" wide curtain panel with one full reservoir. If you need a very large reservoir to avoid refilling so often, a portable steamer is not for you. There was no spattering or leaking of water. Also, the reservoir is attached by a magnet - which I had never seen before but was super helpful. This portable steamer performed as advertised and I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little tool
reviews.reviewText: Works great and small size makes it easy to pack. Does a great job removing wrinkles out of polyester and rayon fabrics. Good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Travel Essential
reviews.reviewText: Recently purchased this steamer for a series of weddings I had to travel for and it has been a welcome addition to my travel essentials, and its lightweight design truly stands out. The compact size made it a breeze to carry around, fitting seamlessly into my luggage without adding unnecessary weight.The convenience of this product is undeniable—it's easy to travel with, and the overall construction is durable enough to withstand the rigors of frequent use. The zipper worked smoothly, and the material held up well during my journeys.One aspect to consider is that, like many travel-friendly items, getting the wrinkles out of clothes packed in this bag required a bit of effort. While it wasn't a deal-breaker for me, it's worth noting that a quick touch-up with a steamer or some extra care during packing may be necessary to maintain a polished look.In summary, this steamer is a solid choice for those on the go who prioritize lightweight and portable solutions. Just be prepared to put in a little extra effort when it comes to wrinkle management. I'm giving it four stars for its overall convenience and travel-friendly design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable steamer, no spill design
reviews.reviewText: Bought for $39.99 in Dec of 2023. It works very well for it's size. It's made so you can use it with things hanging as well as things laying horizontally. So you can lay things out on an ironing board or bed and steam them. The face does get quite hot, so place a hand towel on top of the item if you want to use the steamer like an iron. The water tank is small to keep the steamer travel size, so does run out pretty quickly. For travel and/or light use, this steamer is great. Time will if it's built for a decently long lifespan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny but mighty
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for a trip but ended up using at home in place of my regular steamer! Love how easily this is to transport but also highly effective and easy to use. I can steam 1-2 garments with the amount of water the reservoir holds, but it heats up so quickly it is not a burden if I need to steam more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I recently traveled by plane to a conference where I had to meet some important people and also give a stand-up presentation. The weather was cold and I packed some nice wool sweaters and chinos. My suitcase was stuffed and of course everything got very wrinkled. I bought this steamer and tried it out before the trip. It is compact and fits easily into the extra zipper space in my carry-on bag. It heats up immediately and makes lots of steam, and I could steam my entire outfit before the water chamber needed a refill. It probably takes longer than ironing, and probably doesn't work quite as well, but it get the job done and is WAY easier than setting up an iron. This steamer can be placed directly onto fabric for very stubborn areas, including wool, or it can be used 1-2 cm from fabric for a quick wrinkle release. I hang the garment from the shower curtain bar steam before I go to bed and it doesn't take long. I looked great in my outfits and I'll be packing this item on all my trips. I have even used it on wool blazers that got crushed from being packed in a suitcase. It takes the dents out of the shoulders and gets the wrinkles out of the back. It even worked on a windbreaker that I had stuffed into a travel pouch (very wrinkled!) The cord is not very long, but it was long enough to reach the garment in an apartment-sized bathroom. The quality is good and it seems like it will last a long time if it care is taken when using and storing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Shoots out a fair amount of steam. No dripping however the garment was slightly damp afterwards. I purchased it for clothing bought online. I had 3 pairs of pants that arrived smashed in those small plastic bags. The shipping wrinkles were still visible even after washing them and air drying. This little machine (with some work) removed the wrinkles pretty much. The water tank is small so I needed to fill it for each pair of pants. I found the cord to be cumbersome. It’s thick and tweaked so the unit was tipping over when I sat it down. Can’t have it tipping over because the metal steam plate is hot. I did finally manage move the cord around to avoid it tipping over. I first tried it with the garment on a hanger through a cupboard handle like some of the videos showed. I found it easier to work the unit with the hanger on my shower rod. I don’t plan to travel with it…kinda bulky and heavy. All in all I could have gotten the same results by holding my Rowenta iron towards the garment and blasting it with steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works but does sputter a bit
reviews.reviewText: I prefer to start the day looking fairly put together and wrinkle free. On the road, I've tried travel irons but they're a heavy bother, and hotel irons are just barely serviceable. This steamer is small enough to go into a side pocket of my suitcase and works well enough. It's not hugely powerful but it saves some time over ironing, and clothes can stay on the hanger while you steam them. It does sputter a little; not enough for it to be problematic as long as it gets the job done, which it does.
Très bon appareil, génial pour apporter en voyage. Je le recommande!

I returned the first one because it stopped steaming and gave this company a second chance by repurchasing. I'll be returning the second steamer for the same reason as the first. It just stops working no rhyme or reason. I won't be buying it a third time.
